languages.text: "О, конечно, не могла. Помощников слишком много, чтобы я назвала всех поименно, но будь уверен{mf||а}, их немало, как и других почитателей господина Войгтвира. Моя смерть ничего не изменит — истинный Вольный Торговец покажет себя и займет свое место, когда придет время".

traits.locale_text: "О, конечно не могла. Помощников слишком много, чтобы я назвала всех поименно, но будь уверен{mf||а}, их не мало, и моя смерть ничего не изменит — истинный Вольный Торговец покажет себя и займет твое место".
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."
languages.original_text: "О, конечно, не могла. Помощников слишком много, чтобы я назвала всех поименно, но будь уверен{mf||а}, их немало, как и других почитателей господина Войгтвира. Моя смерть ничего не изменит — истинный Вольный Торговец покажет себя и займет свое место, когда придет время".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, of course I could not. There are too many confidants to list them all, but rest assured that there are a lot of them, as well as the followers of Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will show up and take his rightful place when the time comes."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Oh, of course I could not. There are too many confidants to list them all, but rest assured that there are a lot of them, as well as the followers of Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will show up and take his rightful place when the time comes."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

My death will not change anything—the true Rogue Trader will show up and take his rightful place when the time is right."

My death will not change anything—the true Rogue Trader will show up and take his rightful place when the time is right."

My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: 「ええ、もちろん、そんなことはしていないわ。お友達全員の名前を挙げるには多すぎるけど、安心なさい、ほとんどはマスタ－・ボイトヴィルの支持者でもあるの。私が死んだところで何一つ変わらない…時が来れば、真の自由開拓者が現れて正当な立場につくわ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、もちろん、そんなことはしていないわ。お友達全員の名前を挙げるには多すぎるけど、安心なさい、ほとんどはマスタ－・ボイトヴィルの支持者でもあるの。私が死んだところで何一つ変わらない…時が来れば、真の自由開拓者が現れて正当な立場につくわ」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: “噢，我当然不可能独自策划这一切。我的帮手还有很多，一时半会儿根本说不完。但你大可以放心，这些人有很多很多，维特威尔大师忠诚的追随者也有很多很多。我一个人的死亡不会改变任何事情，真正的行商浪人总有一天会回到这里，夺回属于他的位置。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我当然不可能独自策划这一切。我的帮手还有很多，一时半会儿根本说不完。但你大可以放心，这些人有很多很多，维特威尔大师忠诚的追随者也有很多很多。我一个人的死亡不会改变任何事情，真正的行商浪人总有一天会回到这里，夺回属于他的位置。”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: « Non, je n'étais pas seule. Les conjurés sont trop nombreux pour tous les nommer, mais je peux vous assurer que la liste est aussi longue que celle des fidèles de Voigtvir. Alors, vous pouvez bien me tuer, cela n'y changera rien. Quand le moment sera venu, le véritable libre-marchand viendra prendre la place qui lui est due. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: « Non, je n'étais pas seule. Les conjurés sont trop nombreux pour tous les nommer, mais je peux vous assurer que la liste est aussi longue que celle des fidèles de Voigtvir. Alors, vous pouvez bien me tuer, cela n'y changera rien. Quand le moment sera venu, le véritable libre-marchand viendra prendre la place qui lui est due. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: «Por supuesto que no. Hay demasiados ayudantes como para enumerarlos a todos, pero tenga por seguro que hay muchos, tan numerosos como los seguidores del maestro Voigtvir. Mi muerte no cambiará nada, el verdadero Comerciante Independiente aparecerá y ocupará el lugar que le corresponde cuando llegue el momento».
languages.original_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto que no. Hay demasiados ayudantes como para enumerarlos a todos, pero tenga por seguro que hay muchos, tan numerosos como los seguidores del maestro Voigtvir. Mi muerte no cambiará nada, el verdadero Comerciante Independiente aparecerá y ocupará el lugar que le corresponde cuando llegue el momento».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Oh, das habe ich natürlich nicht. Ich habe zu viele Helfer, um sie alle aufzuzählen, aber ich versichere Euch, es sind viele. Genau, wie es viele Leute gibt, die Meister Voigtvir folgen. Mein Tod wird nichts ändern. Der wahre Freihändler wird kommen und seinen rechtmäßigen Platz einnehmen, wenn der richtige Augenblick gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, natürlich nicht. Es sind zu viele Vertraute, um sie alle aufzuzählen, aber seid versichert: Es sind viele. Und es gibt noch die Anhänger von Meister Voigtvir. Mein Tod wird nichts ändern. Der wahre Freihändler wird erscheinen und seinen rechtmäßigen Platz einnehmen, wenn der richtige Augenblick gekommen ist."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Tabii ki bir başıma yapmadım. Bu işte bana yardımcı olan o kadar çok insan var ki say say bitmez. Aynı şekilde Üstat Voigtvir'in izinden giden birçokları var. Ölümüm hiçbir şeyi değiştirmeyecek. Vakit geldiğinde gerçek Hür Tacir gelip başa geçecek."
languages.original_text: "Oh, of course I didn't. I have too many helpers to list them all, but rest assured there are plenty of them, just as there are plenty of people who follow Master Voigtvir. My death will not change anything — the true Rogue Trader will come and take his rightful place when the time is right."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki bir başıma yapmadım. Bu işte bana yardımcı olan onca şahıs var ki hepsini saymam mümkün değil. Aynı şekilde Üstat Voigtvir'in ardından giden birçok kişi var. Ölümüm hiçbir şeyi değiştirmeyecektir. Vakit geldiğinde gerçek Hür Tacir gelecek ve başa geçecektir."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
